text: Carlos Moreno (29 August 1938 - 9 March 2014) was an Argentine actor and director. He worked most on movies and television shows. He was born in La Plata, Buenos Aires Province. Moreno had a heart attack on 6 September 2013 and survived. On 9 March 2014, he had another heart attack, and died from it, in Buenos Aires. He was 75 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Argentine movie directors Category:Actors from Buenos Aires Category:Argentine television actors Category:Argentine stage actors
title: Carlos Moreno (actor)
